text: Bawa Jain (born Preminder Nath Jain February 16, 1957) is the Secretary- General for the World Council of Religious Leaders.Biography, Bawa Jain, retrieved 2015-03-25 He first presided as such at the 2000 Millennium World Peace Summit of Religious and Spiritual Leaders.The World Council of Religious Leaders, Millennium Peace Summit, retrieved 2015-03-25 ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century Indian Jains Category:21st-century Indian Jains
title: Bawa Jain
